courseSection0.text0:
Complete the following: 
ENC4293 - Documentation and Project Management (3)
ENC4294 - Client-Based Project Management (3)
ENC4280 - Technical Writing Style (3)
ENC3241 - Writing for the Technical Professional (3)
courseSection0.text1:
Complete at least 1 of the following: 
ENC4215 - Document Design and Publication (3)
ENC4218 - Visual Technical Communication (3)

courseSection1.text0: ENC4219 - Technical Communication and Plain Language (3)
courseSection1.text2: ENC4265 - Writing for the Computer Industry (3)
courseSection1.text3: ENC4290 - Usability Testing for Technical Communication (3)
courseSection1.text5: ENC4415 - Digital Rhetorics and The Modern Dialectic (3)
courseSection1.text6: ENC4298 - Technical Communication for the Virtual Workplace (3)

li.A grade of \"C\" (2.0) or better is requ: A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
li.At least 12 hours used in the minor must: At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study: Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection0.text:
Other Requirements

A grade of "C" (2.0) or better is required in each course used to satisfy the minor.
At least 12 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship, Co-op, or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
